column5: `n_channels`: number of channels on the xDbit chip
`spot_width`: width of the channels/pixels in µm
`frame`: width in µm of the frame that is left around the dataset.
`align_images:align_channel`: string pattern for files containing the images of the alignment channel.
`align_images:dapi_channel`: string pattern for files containing the images of the DAPI channel.
`hq_images:channel_names`: space-separated list of string patterns for files containing a channel of the hq images.
`hq_images:channel_labels`: space-separated list of names for the channels of the hq images.
`organism` needs to fit into gprofiler naming convention, e.g. mmusculus or hsapiens
